attack.mods.help.description: Certain attacks can have modifiers (Poison, Paralyze, etc). They affect how the Attack behaves and/or how it should be handled by the Player. Look for the Icons on the Enemy's Attacks and plan accordingly
attack.mods.help.name: Attack Modifiers
attack.mods.assassin.description:
<style="value">Marked</style> attacks can only target a Player.

Followers cannot be used to receive damage.
attack.mods.assassin.name: Marked
attack.mods.brutal.description: <style="value">Savage</style> attacks deal <style="value">Double</style> the amount of damage than the attack strength.
attack.mods.brutal.name: Savage
attack.mods.cumbersome.description: Enemies with <style="value">Bulky</style> attacks are very heavy and slow. <style="value">Movement</style> can be used to <style="status">Reduce</style> the attack strength.
attack.mods.cumbersome.name: Bulky
attack.mods.none.description: This attack does not have any special effect.
attack.mods.none.name: None
attack.mods.paralyze.description:
<style="paralyze">Paralyzing</style> attacks targeting a Player forces them to <style="status">Discard</style> all of their Cards (not the <style="wound">Wounds</style>).

<style="paralyze">Paralyzing</style> attacks targeting a Follower will <style="status">Destroy</style> them.
attack.mods.paralyze.name: Paralyze
attack.mods.poison.description:
<style="poison">Poison</style> attacks targeting a Player add <style="value">1</style> <style="wound">Wound</style> into the <style="status">Discard</style> pile.

<style="poison">Poison</style> attacks targeting a Follower deals <style="value">1</style> additional <style="wound">Wound</style>.
attack.mods.poison.name: Poison
attack.mods.swift.description: <style="value">Quick</style> attacks require <style="value">Double</style> the amount of Block than the attack strength to block it.
attack.mods.swift.name: Quick
attack.type.basic.description: Basic attacks cannot be used during the Range Attack phase - unless an active effect states otherwise.
attack.type.basic.name: Basic
attack.type.range.description: Range Attacks can be used in ANY Attack Phase. In the Range Attack phase, they can only target Enemies that are NOT Fortified.
attack.type.range.name: Range
attack.type.siege.description: Siege Attacks can be used in Any Attack Phase. In the Range Attack phase, they can only target Enemies that are NOT Double-Fortified.
attack.type.siege.name: Siege
attack.type.elemental.description: Elemental Attacks (Fire, Frost, Chaos) can be used against Enemies with Resistance to opposite type of Element (Fire against Frost, Chaos against everything)
attack.type.elemental.name: Elemental
attack.cancelled.help.name: Cancelling Attacks
attack.cancelled.help.description: Cancelled Attacks do not occur and thus do not need to be Blocked / will not generate Wounds or any Additional effects due to their modifier (if any).
